nodes.text: Millennium Falcon Owner's Workshop Manual advertisement

The Millennium Falcon Owner's Workshop Manual advertisement is an advertisement produced by Haynes to advertise the Millennium Falcon Owner's Workshop Manual. It was printed in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.27. The story includes the characters Han Solo and Chewbacca.

After a game of sabacc, Han Solo and Chewbacca fly the Millennium Falcon and run into TIE/LN starfighters. Unable to escape, Chewbacca pilots the Millennium Falcon while Solo tries to repair its hyperdrive. After reading the instructions on the manual, Solo finally manages to fix the hyperdrive and the Millennium Falcon makes its jump to lightspeed.
